LanguageData.RR_SS_setting_doPowerPreregs_tooltip: Ensures powered buildings require electricity to invent.
LanguageData.RR_SS_setting_doSurgeryPreregs_tooltip: Ensures installation of advanced artifical bodyparts requires an appropriate understanding of medicine and prosthetics. For example, installing a simple wooden peg leg only requires the most basic understanding of apparel, while installing a bionic leg requires understanding the inner workings of basic prosthetics.
LanguageData.RR_SS_setting_doSurgeryPreregs_option_Ea: Assign prerequisites from earlier in the tech tree.
LanguageData.RR_settings_restartWarning: Restarting the game is required for the above to apply.
